cleaned_text: Dizziness & Balance Disorders The physicians at ENT Center of Utah are experts in the diagnosis and treatment of balance disorders. After diagnosing the balance problem various treatment modalities including medical, surgical, and vestibular rehabilitation can improve overall balance function. Common balance disorders we see include Meniere's disease, benign paroxysmal positional vertigo, vestibular neuritis and, labyrinthitis.
